column1: Uchi////The only reason this loses a star is the poor pacing of our meal.  Part of the reason one eats out at a place like Uchi is to lose oneself in the theatre of it all.  To linger; to forget
column2: to rest for an hour or two along the edge of the haze of too much food and too much drink.  We were pretty unceremoniously rushed along
column3: and plopped out back into the workaday world.  We even asked to be slowed down
